# Project Chimera - Copilot Instructions

## Project Context
This is Project Chimera: A factory for autonomous AI influencers using FastRender swarm pattern, MCP, and Agentic Commerce.

## Development Rules
1. Always check specs/ directory before coding
2. Write failing tests first (TDD approach)
3. Use MCP for all external integrations
4. Follow FastRender pattern (Planner-Worker-Judge)
5. All commits must reference specs/ or tests/

## MCP Integration
- Tenx MCP is configured for telemetry
- All agent tools must go through MCP servers
- Traceability is mandatory
